name: Rusted Heart
description:
Rust creeps into the heart of Nyx, as her world crumbles to concrete around her.

Play as Nyx, a devoted Tom-Girl with a revolutionary spirit and a VERY good throw.  Lob flaming rocks, spikey Actums and explosives at your enemy while exploring a rusted, concrete and crumbling world of smoke, fire, and metal.

Enjoy the chaotic sounds and iron clangs of this mysterious world, while Nyx runs for her life away from the oppressive bullets of the Syrottans. 

This project was made in a single week, and was created offline! It was quite a challenge.

DOWNLOAD VERSION RECOMMENDED FOR BEST EXPERIENCE!

ITCH browser version doesn't work but GameJolt does, it takes a moment to load but it works great here if you turn the quality settings down to lemon (press ESC) ((AND THE MUSIC DOESN'T PLAY 😢 )): https://gamejolt.com/games/rustedheart/780960
